attributes.action: Ensure all Veterinary Practices have adequate training for birds and exotics.
attributes.additional_details: We’ve encountered many people who have had their birds die in their hands as there have been no local specialists. We have struggled finding someone who knows about birds and have been passed from pillar to post. This petition aims to ensure that 1 vet from every medium size practice gets trained adequately to be able to offer a a basic check up. Likewise, breeders should inform buyers of their local specialists. Therefore I also recommend a specialists register for easy accessibility for all.
attributes.background: 2017 saw a big change for us. We obtained a new home. And we increased our family by buying 6 feathered friends. We bought these one by one after falling in love with each new companion. But there aren’t any vets in the local area who can even perform a check up on our friends. This is not unusual.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you're concerned about the availability of veterinary specialists, but we're not sure what action you'd like the Government or Parliament to take to address this.  

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
